original_text: And when they had finished it, they brought the rest of the money before the king and Jehoiada, whereof were made vessels for the house of the Lord, even vessels to minister, and to offer withal, and spoons, and vessels of gold and silver. And they offered burnt offerings in the house of the Lord continually all the days of Jehoiada.
korean_text: 공사를 마친 후에 그 남은 돈을 왕과 여호야다 앞으로 가져왔으므로 그것으로 여호와의 전에 쓸 그릇을 만들었으니 곧 섬겨 제사 드리는 그릇이며 또 숟가락과 금은 그릇들이라 여호야다가 세상에 사는 모든 날에 여호와의 전에 항상 번제를 드렸더라

sentences.original_text: And when they had finished it,
they brought the rest of the money
whereof were made vessels for the house of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것으로 주의 집을 위한 기구들을 만들었고

sentences.original_text: even vessels to minister, and to offer withal,
sentences.korean_translation: 즉 섬기고 제물을 드리기 위한 기구들과

sentences.original_text: and spoons, and vessels of gold and silver.
in the house of the Lord continually
